Node-Red Dashboard Custom CSS
format:
<style>
  body {
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(55deg,
        #161616 0%,
        #161616 50%,
        #161616 100%);
  }

  /************************************* ui_text *************************************/
  /* Cambiar el bold para label y value de los text */
  .nr-dashboard-text .label {
    font-weight: bold !important;
  }

  .nr-dashboard-text .value {
    font-weight: normal !important;
  }

  /************************************* ui_Gauge *************************************/
  /* Color de los gauges */
  .nr-dashboard-gauge path {
    fill: #ff7b00 !important;
  }

  .nr-dashboard-gauge circle {
    fill: #ff7b00 !important;
  }

  element {
    background: rgb(255, 106, 7);
  }

  /************************************* ui_switch *************************************/
  /* Color del circulo del switch */
  .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch.md-checked .md-thumb {
    background-color: #ff981d;
  }

  /* Color de la barra del switch */
  .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch.md-checked .md-bar {
    background-color: rgb(163 113 41 / 50%);
  }

  /* template ui_switch */
  .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template md-switch.md-checked:not([disabled]) .md-thumb {
    background-color: #ffb900;
  }

  .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template md-switch.md-checked:not([disabled]) .md-bar {
    background-color: rgb(255 165 22 / 50%);
  }


  /*Top bar*/
  body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar,
  body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
    background-color: transparent !important;
    color: #ffffff !important;
  }

  /*Left menu*/
  /*Sidebar*/
  body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
    color: white !important;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;
  }

  /* Añadir espacio entre los botones */
  /* md-list-item {
            margin-bottom: 10px !important;
            margin-top: 10px !important;
        }*/

  md-list-item._md-button-wrap {
    margin: 10px;
  }

  nr-menu-item-active {
    border-right: 4px solid #ffe600;
  }

  /*Hover selection*/
  a.md-no-style,
  button.md-no-style {
    border-radius: 10px !important;
  }

  .md-button.md-default-theme:not([disabled]).md-focused,
  .md-button:not([disabled]).md-focused,
  .md-button.md-default-theme:not([disabled]):hover,
  .md-button:not([disabled]):hover {
    background-color: none !important;
  }

  /*Selected*/
  .nr-menu-item-active div button {
    /* border-right: 4px solid rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;
            border-left: 4px solid rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; */
    /* background-color: #ff730000; */
    border: none !important;
  }

  md-list-item.md-no-proxy.md-button,
  md-list-item .md-no-style.md-button {
    margin: 0px 5px !important;
    width: 95% !important;
  }

  /*List*/
  body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
    color: white !important;
    background-color: rgb(165, 75, 40) !important;
    border-radius: 10px !important;
  }

  /*Groups*/
  ui-card-panel {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.089) !important;
    border-radius: 10px !important;
  }

  .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
    border: none !important;
  }

  /*Name groups*/
  .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
    color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  }

  /*Bouttons*/
  .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) !important;
  }

  .md-button {
    border-radius: 10px !important;
  }

  /*Dropdown menu*/

  /* Color de fondo en el efecto de abrir */
  .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu {
    background-color: rgb(39, 39, 39) !important;
    /* background-color: transparent !important; */
  }

  .nr-dashboard-theme .md-select-menu-container {
    border-radius: 10px !important;
    border: none !important;
  }

  /* Color de la opcion seleccionada en el menú desplegable */
  .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option[selected] {
    color: white !important;
    background-color: #ff7b00 !important;
  }

  /* Color con hover sobre las opciones del menú desplegable */
  .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:hover {
    background-color: #555555 !important;
  }

  /*Template*/
  md-card>img,
  md-card>md-card-header img,
  md-card md-card-title-media img {
    border-radius: 10px !important;
  }

  /* Color picker text BG */
  .nr-dashboard-theme .color-picker-input-wrapper>input {
    color: white !important;
    background-color: transparent !important;
  }
</style>

name: gauge-style
format:
<style id="hotNipi-gauge">
:root{
    --needle-color:#001100;
    --sec-high-color:#ff00004f;
    --sec-normal-color:#00ff004f;
}
.g-container {
    padding-top: 3px;
    padding-bottom: 3px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    user-select:none;
}
    
.g-body{
    width:98%;
    height:98%;
    border-radius:15%;
    position:relative;
    display: flex;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    box-shadow: 0px 5px 8px #00000045;
    background:linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(78,78,78,1) 0%, rgba(215,215,215,1) 99%, rgba(236,236,236,1) 100%);
}

.g-body::before {    
    content: "";
    background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,PHN2ZyB4bWxucz0naHR0cDovL3d3dy53My5vcmcvMjAwMC9zdmcnIHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnPgogIDxyZWN0IHdpZHRoPSc1JyBoZWlnaHQ9JzUnIGZpbGw9J3doaXRlJy8+CiAgPHBhdGggZD0nTTAgNUw1IDBaTTYgNEw0IDZaTS0xIDFMMSAtMVonIHN0cm9rZT0nIzg4OCcgc3Ryb2tlLXdpZHRoPScxJy8+Cjwvc3ZnPg=="); 
    background-repeat: repeat;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0px;
    right: 0px;
    bottom: 0px;
    left: 0px;
    opacity: 0.1;
    border-radius:15%;
}

.g-ring{
    width:90%;
    height:90%;
    border-radius:50%;
    position:relative;
    display: flex;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
   
    background:linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(78,78,78,1) 0%, rgba(215,215,215,1) 99%, rgba(236,236,236,1) 100%);;
}
.g-plate {
    overflow:hidden;
    width: 90%;
    height: 90%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    position: relative;
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 15px black;
    background: radial-gradient(circle, #dd8400 3%, rgb(196 205 209) 1%, rgb(177 183 186) 40%, rgb(108 114 120) 100%);
}
.g-sector{
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
   
    transform-origin: 0 0;
}
.g-sector-high {
    background: var(--sec-high-color);
    transform: rotate(329deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}
.g-sector-normal {
    background:var(--sec-normal-color);
    transform: rotate(329deg) skew(12deg, 23deg);
}
.g-ticks {
    position: absolute;
    top:0;
    left:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 6px black);
}
.g-tick {
    transform: rotate(calc(27deg * var(--ga-tick) - 71deg));
    background: #000;
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    top: 50%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 1%;
    margin-bottom: -1%;
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 2%,rgb(0 0 0 / 60%) 10%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 10%);
}
.g-num {
    position: absolute;
}
.g-nums {
    position: absolute;
    top:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    color: #000000a1;
    font-size: calc(var(--container-size) * 16%);
    font-weight: 500;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 4px 6px black);
}
.g-needle {
    transform: rotate(calc(270deg * calc(var(--g-angle, 0deg) / 99) - 45deg));
    transition: transform 1s;
    background: #000;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 49%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2%;
    filter:drop-shadow(0px 1px 3px #00000080);
    background: linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(2,0,36,0) 0,rgba(0,0,0,0) 15%,var(--needle-color) 15%,var(--needle-color) 50%,rgba(0,0,0,0) 50%);
}
.g-needle-ring {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5%);
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    background: var(--needle-color);
    border-radius: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    box-shadow: 0 1px 4px #0000009c;
}
.g-val{
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    bottom: 8%;
    width: 80px;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size:  calc(var(--container-size) * 40%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000080);
}
.g-label{
    position: absolute;
    text-align: center;
    left: 50%;
    top: 55%;
    width: 100%;
    transform: translateX(-50%);
    font-family: monospace;
    font-size:  calc(var(--container-size) * 18%);
    color: #000000a1;
    filter: drop-shadow(2px 3px 2px #00000080);
}
.g-rivets{
    position: absolute;
    left:0;
    top:0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

.g-rivet {
    position: absolute;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 2px);
    border-radius: 50px;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #adadad 0%,#d3d3d3 51%,#d1d1d1 68%,#8c8c8c 100%);
    box-shadow: 0px 2px 4px #000, -1px -1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(1){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(2){
    top:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(3){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    left:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}
.g-rivet:nth-child(4){
    bottom:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
    right:calc(var(--container-size) * 1.5px);
}

.g-rivet::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 50%;
    top: 50%;
    width: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    height: calc(var(--container-size) * 10%);
    box-shadow: inset 0px 1px 2px #222;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
}
</style>
